model.Manuscript

    Package Description
    control

    • Uses of Manuscript in control

      Methods in control that return Manuscript 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Manuscript ManuscriptControl.getManuscriptByID(int theKey)
      Returns a single Manuscript object by it's unique ID.
      Methods in control that return types with arguments of type Manuscript 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<Manuscript> ManuscriptControl.getAcceptedManuscripts(Conference theConference)
      Returns list of manuscripts in this conference that have final status of APPROVED.
      static java.util.List<Manuscript> ManuscriptControl.getManuscripts(Conference theConference, User theUser)
      Returns list of manuscripts in this conference that this user has 'access' to.
      static java.util.List<Manuscript> ManuscriptControl.getManuscripts(Conference theConference, User theUser, AccessLevel theAccessLevel)
      Returns list of manuscripts in this conference for this user and AccessLevel.
      static java.util.List<Manuscript> ManuscriptControl.getUnassignedSPC(Conference theConference)
      Returns list of manuscripts in this conference with SPC field marked as NULL.
      Methods in control with parameters of type Manuscript 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ManuscriptControl.addReviewer(Manuscript theManuscript, User theReviewer)
      This method will add a relation between the user and the manuscript within the database that indicates they are a reviewer for this manuscript.
      static int ManuscriptControl.createManuscript(Manuscript theManuscript)
      Use this method to submit a freshly created manuscript to the database and retrieve its unique ID number.
      static java.util.List<User> ManuscriptControl.getReviewers(Manuscript theManuscript)
      Returns the list of users marked as reviewers for the manuscript.
      static java.util.List<Review> ManuscriptControl.getReviews(Manuscript theManuscript)
      Returns list of all of the reviews for this manuscript.
      static java.util.List<Review> ManuscriptControl.getReviews(Manuscript theManuscript, User theUser)
      Returns list of reviews for this manuscript that this user has 'access' to.
      static java.lang.String ManuscriptControl.updateFinal(Manuscript theManuscript, Status theStatus)
      This method will update the final status for the specified manuscript in the database.
      static java.lang.String ManuscriptControl.updateManuscript(Manuscript theManuscript)
      Use this method to update a manuscript in the database after one of it's fields has been changed.
      static java.lang.String ManuscriptControl.updateRecommend(Manuscript theManuscript, Status theStatus)
      This method will update the recommend status for the specified manuscript in the database.
      static java.lang.String ManuscriptControl.updateSPC(Manuscript theManuscript, User theSPC)
      This method will update the SPC assigned to the specified manuscript in the database.
